oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Veteran's Re-union at Knoxville 1890
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Veteran's Re-union at Knoxville, October 7, 8 and 9, 1890. Headquarters, Committee on Entertainment and Public Comfort. Knoxville, Tenn. Letterhead illustration from Sept. 25, 1890 letter. Etching shows seated Union and Confederate soldiers, angel overhead with cornucopia, background is bird's-eye view of Knoxville. View in circle of Fort Saunders, 1863.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Veterans; Reunions; Civil wars; Letterheads;
